snippet: The Nov. 22 issue has a secondary cover on the back page that carries the Rolling Stone nameplate but has cover lines entirely in Spanish.
abstract: Advertising column notes that Nov 22 issue of Rolling Stone magazine will feature a second cover on the back page entirely in Spanish; special section also features Spanish ads and content to appeal to a growing demographic in the United States.
lead_paragraph: The Nov. 22 issue has a secondary cover on the back page that carries the Rolling Stone nameplate but has cover lines entirely in Spanish.

headline.seo: Rolling Stone Section Is Aimed at Latinos, Even the Ads
headline.main: Rolling Stone Pages Aimed at Latinos, Even the Ads
headline.print_headline: Rolling Stone Pages Aimed at Latinos, Even the Ads
